debugoverlay/Axis.description: Displays an axis indicator at the specified position.

debugoverlay/Box.description: Displays a solid coloured cube at the specified position.

debugoverlay/BoxAngles.description: Displays a solid colored rotated cube at the specified position.

debugoverlay/Cross.description: Creates a coloured cross at the specified position for the specified time.

debugoverlay/EntityTextAtPosition.description: Displays 2D text at the specified coordinates.

debugoverlay/Grid.description: Draws a 3D grid of limited size in given position.

debugoverlay/Line.description: Displays a coloured line at the specified position.

debugoverlay/ScreenText.description: Displays text triangle at the specified coordinates.

debugoverlay/Sphere.description: Displays a coloured sphere at the specified position.

debugoverlay/SweptBox.description: Displays "swept" box, two boxes connected with lines by their verices.

debugoverlay/Text.description: Displays text at the specified position.

debugoverlay/Triangle.description: Displays a colored triangle at the specified coordinates.
